TopicTitle: The KOI-4 Linebacker SSTO family (Tested with MechJeb, NEAR) (BDArmory required)

Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Downloads here. Action Group info and flight instructions are included in the craft descriptions.

You look like you are interested in weaponized craft. Would you like to join Kerbal Military Engineering? They make warships using BDArmory. I'm sure Kerdinand would love to have you-we don't have many SSTOs.
